* [[Gnoppix]], intended to offer the GNOME desktop environment on a Live CD. Discontinued.
* [[Gnoppix]], intended to offer the GNOME desktop environment on a Live CD. Discontinued.
* [[gOS (operating system)| gOS]] uses the GNOME desktop environment with user interface enhancements to make it work more like [[OSX]], it also features [[Google Apps]], [[Picasa]], [[Google Gadgets]] and other web-based applications, and comes with [[Wine (software)|Wine 1.0]] pre-installed
* [[gOS (operating system)| gOS]] uses the GNOME desktop environment with user interface enhancements to make it work more like [[OSX]], it also features [[Google Apps]], [[Picasa]], [[Google Gadgets]] and other web-based applications, and comes with [[Wine (software)|Wine 1.0]] pre-installed

* [[Greenie]], an Ubuntu-based distribution created for Slovak and Czech users. Combinates solid Ubuntu and experimental features.
+
* [[Greenie Linux]], an Ubuntu-based distribution created for Slovak and Czech users. Combinates solid Ubuntu and experimental features.
* [[Guadalinex]], an Ubuntu-based distribution promoted by the local government of [[Andalucia]], Spain, for home users and schools (cf. EduLinux, Skolelinux).
* [[Guadalinex]], an Ubuntu-based distribution promoted by the local government of [[Andalucia]], Spain, for home users and schools (cf. EduLinux, Skolelinux).
* [[Hiweed]] is a Chinese Linux distribution, based on Ubuntu. Its features include preconfigured Chinese applications, such as Chinese (simplified) input method, Chinese-English and English-Chinese dictionaries, and Chinese (simplified) true-type fonts.
* [[Hiweed]] is a Chinese Linux distribution, based on Ubuntu. Its features include preconfigured Chinese applications, such as Chinese (simplified) input method, Chinese-English and English-Chinese dictionaries, and Chinese (simplified) true-type fonts.
